opportunities.description: Joint AI and deep learning research initiatives with leading universities using structured software design frameworks
Funding deep learning framework development that addresses gaps in current AI research software
Recruit academic researchers and software developers specialized in deep learning framework creation

action_items: Reach out to AI research teams at University of Toronto, NYU, and Stanford for collaboration discussions
Propose partnership models focusing on structured software frameworks for deep learning
Explore investment avenues to support framework development projects
Identify candidates for hiring from involved university research groups
